name: TC-22-P :: Remove a Product from the Cart

actions.action: Navigate to a specific product detail page.
actions.expectedResult: The product detail page is displayed correctly.

actions.action: Select the product's size and color.
Click "Continue shopping" or close the modal.
Click the shopping cart icon at the top of the page.
actions.expectedResult: The shopping cart page is loaded

actions.action: Click the "delete" link or icon next to the product line item.
actions.expectedResult: The product line item disappears from the cart.

actions.action: Verify the cart is now empty.
actions.expectedResult: A message such as "There are no more items in your cart" is displayed.
